member.name: T:ETG.Orleans.Attributes.ApiControllerAttribute
member.summary: This attribute can be placed on a grain interface. It indicates to the SDK that an API Controller should be generated for the corresponding grain. A REST API will be generated for each public method defined in the grain interface.

member.name: P:ETG.Orleans.Attributes.ApiControllerAttribute.RoutePrefix
member.summary: The route prefix of the API Controller that will be generated.

member.name: T:ETG.Orleans.Attributes.StateAttribute
member.summary: This attribute can be placed on a grain implementation to indicate that the grain has a State and allows periodic writes of the grain state to storage in a lazy fashion. By default, the lazy write is turned off.

member.name: P:ETG.Orleans.Attributes.StateAttribute.Type
member.summary: The type of the grain state which must be a subclass of . Note that the Type MUST be specified using the typeof() operator right in the attribute definition; otherwise it won't work.

member.name: P:ETG.Orleans.Attributes.StateAttribute.LazyWrite
member.summary: Turning ON the LazyWrite will tell the runtime to persist the State to storage every T seconds. The default value of T is 5s but this value can be change by setting the property.

member.name: P:ETG.Orleans.Attributes.StateAttribute.Period
member.summary: The frequency at which the lazy write of the state will be performed. This property has no effect if is turned off.

member.name: P:ETG.Orleans.Attributes.StateAttribute.StorageProvider
member.summary: Used to define which storage provider to use for persistence of grain state. Using this property is equivalent to using the attribute.
